name: Emergency Survival Kit
description:
Filled with a convenient collection of emergency essentials for the blushing bride, this essentials kit makes the perfect gift for: bridal party or bridal gift - bride to be. The kit can be re-used after the wedding for honeymoon, to keep at the office and filled with practical every day items. 

With these essentials by her side, a bride can be prepared for virtually any emergency on her wedding day and beyond.

Be prepared on your wedding day with the Emergency Survival Kit.
